Posts.Content: Aug 26, 2009 02:08PM judy20000 wrote: I haven't had calf charlie horse cramps, but I have been getting the same type cramp in the arches of my feet.  I just finished chemo a couple of weeks ago, haven't had surgery or radiation yet though.  Dr. said cramps are probably side effect of the drugs.  They are not as bad in the foot as they are in the calf.  I used to get them regularly in my calves many years ago - long before I had breast cancer.  I know they are extremely painful.  Low potasium is one of the causes for them -- so maybe eat more bananas or something.  There is also an over-the-counter pill for them but I don't remember the name of it.
Posts.Title: CHARLY HORSE IN CALF OF LEG O3132W Sige
